§8§oJohn L. Friedman
Kristin Schleich
Donald M. Witt§r

§71995§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o12 pages, REVTEX; 1 postscript figure in a separate uuencoded file. Our earlier version(PRL 71, 1486 (1993)) contained a secondary result, mistakenly attributed to Schoen and Yau, regarding \u201cpassive topological

censorship\u201d of a certain class of topologies. As Gregory Burnett has pointed out(gr-qc/9504012), this secondary result is false. The main topological censorship theorem is unaffected by the error\u00a7r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o26 pages, revtex, 4 figures (available uponrequest). We have added a new Section VIII with four new figures, in which Eq. (35)is used to calculate the graviton spectral energy density and the tensor-induced CMB
